EmailTemplate.description: Created by Whitney Downer, 2/28/12. This email is sent following the webinar to thank them for joining as well as direct them to additional resources.
EmailTemplate.name: Sept6Web: LeadGen.Thank you attending
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Attending our Webinar on Lead Generation!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}},
Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to attend our webinar “The Consultant's Guide to Lead Generation: Three Steps to Securing New Clients." We hope you were able to gain some new insight into growing your independent business. To follow-up on the information provided on Thursday, September 6th, we wanted to share a few resources. Recorded webinar <http://f5159bf2f10bd6337d85-21700ed84a5e5d3baebf7221604c63ee.r66.cf2.rackcdn.com/20120906_Consultants_Guide_to_Lead_Generation.wmv> We invite you to sign-up <http://info.mbopartners.com/2012SeriesSignUp.html> to stay informed about future webinars in our series. If you have any topic recommendations or feedback, please email webinar@mbopartners.com <mailto:webinar@mbopartners.com>.
Thank you, MBO PARTNERS t: 1-800-220-0469
e: info@mbopartners.com
